Name: Roasted Chestnuts (PH)
Description: Roasted in the oven, not an open fire. Still tasty, though!

DescriptionLocalization.es: Roasted in the oven, not an open fire. Still tasty, though!
DescriptionLocalization.ko: Roasted in the oven, not an open fire. Still tasty, though!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Im Ofen geröstet, nicht am offenen Feuer. Aber dennoch lecker!

DescriptionLocalization.ru: Жаренные в духовке, а не на открытом огне. Но все равно вкусные!

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 在烤箱里烤，而不是明火。不过还是很好吃！
